reviews.review_msg: I would highly recommend this course if you're planning to take proof based math courses later on. Joanna gave me a solid foundation that set me up for success with my later studies. I'll definitely look back at this course as a formative part of my degree
Super good at explaining concepts, I understood every lecture right away
Had a great experience with the course. Dr. Niezen explained things clearly (attending office hours proved super helpful - received lots of one-on-one help).

Math292 with Joanna was one of my favorite courses at SFU so far. She did a great job making it engaging, and her kind demeanor made it so nice to come to class! Introduced proofs in a way that didn't feel overwhelming for beginners. Far better than MACM101, choose this course over it if possible!

I cannot stress enough how incredible this course was and how amazing Dr Neizen was as a prof. If you are a math student at SFU, you should absolutely take her 292 course instead of MACM 101. She really cares if you understand the material, and the material is helping me in STAT 270, Math 242 and all my other math courses. She's awesome.

Super nice person. The lectures are good (but need to go to them since there are no posted notes), the assignments are fair, and the tests and final were more than fair too. Would definitely take another class with her if I needed to.

Very good prof. Assignments can be challenging, but she did allow resubmissions which helped to learn from mistakes. Explains concepts very clearly and is willing to go back to clarify anything. Very approachable and kind, would strongly recommend!
Had an amazing time with the course!!!

Joanna is an amazing prof. You can tell she's really enthusiastic about what she teaches and it shows in her classes. Her assignments can be challenging, but they're helpful. Her tests are fair, and she's very approachable because she cares about her students. I'd highly recommend anyone to take a math course with Joanna!
